item.title: Escolhendo versões dos pacotes no Debian/Ubuntu
item.description: Parte 1 - Regra geral Antes de começar a escolher versões vamos estabelecer que todos os pacotes usarão a versão stable por padrão. No arquivo /etc/apt/preferences (que deve estar vazio inicialmente) acrescente as seguintes linhas: # Arquivo: /etc/apt/preferences # Todos os pacotes vem do stable por padrão Package: * Pin: release a=stable Pin-Priority: 1001 Package: * Pin: release a=testing Pin-Priority: 650 Package: * Pin: release a=unstable Pin-Priority: 600 O valor acima de 1000 vai forçar os pacotes que foram instalados na mão usando outras versões a voltarem para o stable.

item.title: Customizing the homepage with widgets
item.description: Homepage widgets display as sections on the homepage. They can be enabled/disabled and configured as desired. Academic has the following widgets available to use: About/biography Selected publications Recent publications Recent news/blog posts Projects Selected talks Recent talks Contact Tag cloud Custom widget (demonstrated with the teaching example) The example site that you copied to create your site uses all the different types of widget (except talks), so you can generally just delete the widgets you don’t need and customize the parameters of the widgets you wish to keep.
